title: How do I connect my phone to a WLAN hotspot with a static IP address to access the Internet?
answer:
Touch Settings > Wi-Fi. Select the hotspot you want to connect to and select Show advanced options. Set IP settings to Static and type the IP address (192.168.1.xxx), gateway (192.168.1.1), subnet mask or network mask (255.255.255.0), and DNS address. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110593)

 [The common problem of using Wi-Fi to access the Internet is that it takes time for your phone to obtain a dynamic IP address from the router. After you set a static IP address for Wi-Fi network access, this problem is addressed. ]()
